hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well MQ Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple MQ Raised Island Courtyard Lower Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS Basement

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Bow# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Blue Potion Bottle# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
